GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
lib/string_helpers: fix not adding strarray to device's resource list

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit a152eb42fcecfe41239c3c6695342f3a128593e7, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit acdb89b6c87a2d7b5c48a82756e6f5c6f599f60a. For more details please see the references link.
